description: Bikini Cocktail combines two things people enjoy… Beautiful women and booze!  Now, enjoy this sexy bartender twosome, Charmane Star and Andrea Lowell, together for the first time in this FREE app. Check out wallpapers of both hotties and apply them as wallpaper for your Palm Pre and Pixi. The app also includes videos of the lovely ladies showing you their favorite, sure-to-please drink recipes.  This free application has limited usage. For more content, purchase the paid version (Bikini Cocktails: Andrea Lowell & Bikini Cocktails: Charmane Star) from the Palm App Catalog.
